revised_title: Morphological Characteristics and Infection Dynamics of Trypanosoma simiae
tldr: The authors describe a new species of trypanosome, Trypanosoma simiae, which infects both monkeys and goats. They discuss its morphology, infection dynamics, and the role of the tsetse fly as a carrier in Nyasaland. The trypanosome is rapidly fatal to monkeys and sets up a chronic disease in goats.
